pr_title: chatcommands: make cox pb account for 11-15 and 16-23 team sizes

timeline.bodyText: I think this can just be String since the Pattern stores the pattern passed as a string, which is what toString() returns.
timeline.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText: Additionally, why isn't this just (?:\\d+(?:\\+|-\\d+)? players|Solo)?
replies.author: Adam-

timeline.message: chatcommands: make cox pb account for 11-15 and 16-23 team sizes
